NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Auditing and Growth or the cell corresponding to Tax and Liquidity?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Auditing} and {Growth} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Capital Markets and Growth or the cell corresponding to Financial Tech and Growth?

NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Capital Markets} and {Risk} has a higher heat value.
